name: Techno Boy
description: Techno boy is an incredibly cool, heartbreaking platformer in which you have to play for the Techno guy and help him go through all the obstacles that stand on his way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.20GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with at least 512 mb Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
